scripts.build: parcel build source/pug/index.pug source/pug/games.pug source/pug/music.pug source/pug/error.pug source/pug/sitemap.pug --dist-dir dist
scripts.postbuild: mv dist/error.html dist/error.htm && mv dist/sitemap.html dist/sitemap.xml && cp -a public/. dist
scripts.start: parcel source/pug/index.pug source/pug/games.pug source/pug/music.pug source/pug/error.pug source/pug/sitemap.pug --open --dist-dir dist-tmp
